Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Protocol.description: Configuration settings for NFS or SMB protocol.
Protocol.markdownDescription:
Configuration settings for NFS or SMB protocol.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

NFS.description: NFS protocol configuration for FSx ONTAP file system.
NFS.markdownDescription:
NFS protocol configuration for FSx ONTAP file system.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

SMB.description: SMB protocol configuration for FSx ONTAP file system.

Domain.description: The name of the Windows domain that the SMB server belongs to.
Domain.markdownDescription:
The name of the Windows domain that the SMB server belongs to.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 253  
Pattern: ^([A-Za-z0-9]+[A-Za-z0-9-.]*)*[A-Za-z0-9-]*[A-Za-z0-9]$  
Update requires: No interruption

Password.description: The password of the user who can mount the share and has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.
Password.markdownDescription:
The password of the user who can mount the share and has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 104  
Pattern: ^.{0,104}$  
Update requires: No interruption

User.description: The user who can mount the share, has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.
User.markdownDescription:
The user who can mount the share, has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 104  
Pattern: ^[^\x5B\x5D\\/:;|=,+*?]{1,104}$  
Update requires: No interruption

SMB.markdownDescription:
SMB protocol configuration for FSx ONTAP file system.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

The specific NFS version that you want DataSync to use to mount your NFS share.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AUTOMATIC | NFS3 | NFS4_0 | NFS4_1  
Update requires: No interruption

The NFS mount options that DataSync can use to mount your NFS share.

Update requires: No interruption

StorageVirtualMachineArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx ONTAP SVM.
StorageVirtualMachineArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx ONTAP SVM.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 162  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):fsx:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:storage-virtual-machine/fs-[0-9a-f]+/svm-[0-9a-f]{17,}$  
Update requires: Replacement

SecurityGroupArns.description: The ARNs of the security groups that are to use to configure the FSx ONTAP file system.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):ec2:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:security-group/sg-[a-f0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupArns.markdownDescription:
The ARNs of the security groups that are to use to configure the FSx ONTAP file system.

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

---

Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\$\p{Zs}]+$

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.markdownDescription:
The URL of the FSx ONTAP file system that was described.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4360  
Pattern: ^(efs|nfs|s3|smb|hdfs|fsx[a-z0-9-]+)://[a-zA-Z0-9.:/\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
